summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. Ordinance No. 24251 entitled: "An ordinance providing for the rebating and refunding of the excess portions of all assessments levied for the improvement of the alley in block 128, A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition, by grading and paving, as provided for by Ordinance No. 21182 creating Local Improvement District No. 2088."
